Wing's - Dumpling Wraps, Dumpling Wrap - 27 x 400 g

Wing's nutritious wraps can be filled with minced pork, beef, chicken, seafood, and a variety of vegetables. Great for Won Ton soup or deep fried for a delicious appetizer or snack. Also available in a variety of dimensions, thickness and packaging formats.

entry.title: Wing's - 8" x 8" Spring Roll Wraps - 4 x 50pack/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wing's
Type: FOOD
Price: 23.99

Spring Roll Wrap

These thin pastry wraps fry up flakey and golden. Fill with your favourite vegetarian or meat filling for any tasty appetizers of your choice.


Applications

Pastry wrap that can be filled with your choice of veggies or meat.

Preparation/Cooking Instructions

Thaw overnight and fill with your favourite choice of fillings.

Ingredients

Water, wheat flour, tapioca starch, canola oil, modified corn starch, salt, propylene glycol, soya lecithin.

entry.summary:

Wonton Wrap

Wing's nutritious Won Ton wraps can be filled with minced pork, beef, chicken, seafood, and a variety of vegetables. Great for Won Ton soup or deep fried for a delicious appetizer or snack. Also available in a variety of dimensions, thickness and packaging formats.

PRODUCT OF CANADA

Applications

entry.title: Wing's - 5.5" x 5.5" Egg Roll Wrap - 12 x 1 Lb
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wing's
Type: FOOD
Price: 26.99

Egg Roll Wrap, Frozen

Fill this light pasta wrapper with your favourite fillings such as chicken, beef, pork, seafood, or mixed vegetables.


Applications

Use as a pasta wrapper to fill with your favorite stuffings.

Preparation/Cooking Instructions

Thaw overnight or a couple hours before use in the refrigerator and then boil to desired firmness.

Ingredients

Wheat flour, water, frozen whole egg and/or frozen albumen, modified corn and/or wheat starch, salt, vinegar, sodium propionate, sodium stearoyl lactylate, potassium sorbate.

entry.title: Fiera Foods - Raspberry Turnover 3.75 Oz - 84 Pcs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Fiera Foods
Type: FOOD
Price: 45.99

Fiera Foods - Raspberry Turnover 3.75 Oz - 84 Pcs

Freezer to Oven, Retarder to Oven RTO.

Pop a tray of this freezer-to-oven pastry dough in your oven and fill your establishment with the irresistible smell of premium ingredients used! Your customers will love indulging in this rich pastry while it's still warm from your oven. This traditional Austrian delicacy is made from intricately braided pastry dough. A generous sprinkling of sugar tops the whole thing off and creates a delicate glaze that is sure to catch your customers' eyes!

With this Pastry dough, whipping up batches of mouthwatering pastries is a breeze! Keep it frozen until you're ready to use, then remove the desired number from the packaging and place on a parchment-lined baking sheet. Bake the pastries in a deck oven preheated to 350 degrees Fahrenheit, a rack oven preheated to 375 degrees Fahrenheit, or a convection oven preheated to 325 degrees Fahrenheit until done. Remove it from the oven and allow to cool completely before serving or packaging.

entry.title: Rich's - Calabrese With Semolina Flour Bread Dough - 24 x 539 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rich's
Type: FOOD
Price: 49.99

Rich's - Calabrese With Semolina Flour Frozen Bread Dough - 24 x 539 g

A Sicilian round bread made and topped with semolina flour for a true artisan appearance and taste. Proof-and-bake format.

INGREDIENTS FOR CANADIAN MARKET: ENRICHED UNBLEACHED WHEAT FLOUR, WATER, YEAST, ENRICHED SEMOLINA WHEAT FLOUR, GLUCOSE-FRUCTOSE, SALT, SOYABEAN OIL, SODIUM STEAROYL- 2-LACTYLATE, ACETYLATED TARTARIC ACID ESTERS OF MONO AND DIGLYCERIDES, ASCORBIC ACID, ENZYME (AMYLASE).

CONTAINS: WHEAT MAY CONTAIN MILK, SOYA, EGG AND SESAME

TIPS & HANDLING

1. PLACE FROZEN DOUGH ON A GREASED SCREEN PAN. DEFROST OVERNIGHT IN A RETARDER. 2. PLACE BREAD ON PANS. GIVE 20 - 30 MINUTES FLOOR TIME. 3. PROOF UNTIL DOUBLE IN SIZE. 4. LET DRY 10 - 15 MINUTES AT ROOM TEMPERATURE. 5. AFTER FLOOR DRIED, SPRAY TOP SURFACE WITH WATER AND WHILE WET DUST WITH SEMOLINA FLOUR. SCORE TOP OF LOAF IN TIC-TAC-TOE PATTERN ABOUT 1.25 CM (1/2 ") DEEP. 6. BAKE UNTIL LOAF IS GOLDEN BROWN. OVEN TEMPERATURES: CONVENTIONAL: 375 F - 400 F (190 C - 205 C) CONVECTION: 350 F - 375 F (180 C - 190 C)

ALLERGENS

CONTAINS: WHEAT MAY CONTAIN MILK, SOYA, EGG AND SESAME

entry.title: Rich's - Italian / French Bread Dough - 24 x 556 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rich's
Type: FOOD
Price: 47.99

Rich's - Italian / French Frozen Bread Dough - 24 x 556 g

What's better than warm, freshly baked rolls straight out of the oven? This Rich's proof and bake Italian bread dough allows you to bake delicious rolls for your customers right in your establishment and fill your kitchen with the intoxicating smell of baking bread! This dough produces a light, yeast-raised bread with a hearty crust and an invitingly soft interior. Offer these rolls alongside a plate of saucy pasta or slice and serve still warm as part of your establishment's bread course. Italian rolls are known for being shorter and more plump than traditional French rolls, making them the perfect size for soaking up extra sauce or soup! Plus, this versatile dough can be customized to your desired length and shape, and even adorned with delicious toppings.

This convenient dough makes it easy to offer batches of fresh rolls in no time! Begin by removing the desired number of rolls from the freezer and placing them on a parchment-lined sheet pan. Cover the pan with plastic and thaw under refrigeration overnight. Remove from the refrigerator and shape into your desired length and let stand for 15 to 30 minutes at room temperature. Brush the dough with egg wash, if desired, then sprinkle with poppy seeds, sesame seeds, or simply leave them plain. Proof the dough until it is doubled in size, then score each with several diagonal cuts or one long cut down the length of the roll. Preheat your oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit, then bake for approximately 30 to 45 minutes, or until golden brown (baking times will vary). Allow your rolls to cool before serving!

entry.title: Krinos - Kataifi Dough - 454 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Krinos
Type: FOOD
Price: 5.39

Krinos - Kataifi Dough - 454 g

This shredded fillo can be formed into cones, shells or nests, or layered into traditional dishes like baklava for a unique texture. No trans fat. No saturated fat. No cholesterol.

Ingredients

Enriched wheat flour, corn starch, water, canola oil, modified food starch, salt, soy lecithin, vital wheat gluten, dextrose, maltodextrin, citric acid, potassium sorbate, calcium and sodium propionate.

Best For: Desserts

entry.title: Apple Valley - Apple 10" Unbaked Pie - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: Apple Valley
Type: FOOD
Price: 8.99

Apple Valley - Apple 10" Frozen Unbaked Pie - Each

Available in your favorite fruit flavor, our 10" Unbaked Pies are ready for the oven. All the apples which go into our top-selling apple pies are from the Annapolis Valley, and our blueberry pies boast wild Nova Scotia berries and the pastry is made with Nova Scotia milled flour. Whatever the filling, we use only the finest ingredients. We're proud of our pies, and you'll love them too.

This unbaked pie provides you with a premium pie crust that is sure to make your dessert stand out. Thick and sturdy, this dish pie has tall, nicely crimped edges that bakes to a visually-appealing golden brown color with a buttery, flaky crust.

Impulse sales are often driven by smell. It's hard to resist the aroma of a pie in the oven. Increase your sales by baking pies during peak hours or all day long. Apple Valley makes it easy. Simply remove the pies from the packaging, place them on your baking trays and into your preheated oven. Watch the consumers drift towards the bakery. Once the pies are cooled, you can put them back into the cartons and right onto your shelves. They won't stay there long! OR if you have a Foodservice establishment, let patrons know they can stay and enjoy a slice of pie at your restaurant or take a full pie home to share with family and friends.
